CFS Data Storage (DS) User's Guide

CFS Data Storage Configuration Parameters

Next: CFS Data Storage Operational Constraints

CFS Data Storage Commands

CFS Data Storage Telemetry

CFS Data Storage Table Definitions

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the CFS Data Storage Application either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Global DS_APP_PIPE_DEPTH

Application Pipe Depth

Global DS_APP_PIPE_NAME

Application Pipe Name

Global DS_BASENAME_BUFSIZE

Destination File Table -- basename buffer size

Global DS_CDS_ENABLE_STATE

Save DS Packet Processor State in Critical Data Store

Global DS_DEF_DEST_FILENAME

Destination File Table -- default table filename

Global DS_DEF_ENABLE_STATE

Default DS Packet Processor State

Global DS_DEF_FILTER_FILENAME

Packet Filter Table -- default table filename

Global DS_DESCRIPTOR_BUFSIZE

Common Table File -- descriptor text buffer size

Global DS_DEST_FILE_CNT

Destination File Table -- number of files

Global DS_DESTINATION_TBL_NAME

Destination File Table -- logical table name

Global DS_EXTENSION_BUFSIZE

Destination File Table -- extension buffer size

Global DS_FILE_HDR_DESCRIPTION

Data Storage File -- cFE file header description

Global DS_FILE_HDR_SUBTYPE

Data Storage File -- cFE file header sub-type

Global DS_FILE_HEADER_TYPE

File Header Type Selection

Global DS_FILE_MIN_AGE_LIMIT

Data Storage File -- minimum age limit

Global DS_FILE_MIN_SIZE_LIMIT

Data Storage File -- minimum size limit

Global DS_FILTER_TBL_NAME

Packet Filter Table -- logical table name

Global DS_FILTERS_PER_PACKET

Packet Filter Table -- filters per packet

Global DS_MAKE_TABLES_CRITICAL

Make DS Tables Critical

Global DS_MAX_SEQUENCE_COUNT

Filename Sequence Count -- max counter value

Global DS_MISSION_REV

Mission specific version number for DS application

Global DS_MOVE_FILES

Move Files to Downlink Directory After Close Selection

Global DS_PACKETS_IN_FILTER_TABLE

Packet Filter Table -- number of packets

Global DS_PATHNAME_BUFSIZE

Destination File Table -- pathname buffer size

Global DS_PER_PACKET_PIPE_LIMIT

Application Per Packet Pipe Limit

Global DS_SECS_PER_HK_CYCLE

Housekeeping Request Frequency

Global DS_SEQUENCE_DIGITS

Filename Sequence Count -- number of digits

Global DS_TOTAL_FNAME_BUFSIZE

Data Storage File -- total filename size

Generated on 25 Jan 2017 for CFS Data Storage (DS) Application on User's Guide by  1.6.1
